    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpRequest

        public HttpRequest(java.net.Socket socket,
                   java.lang.String contentDirectory,
                   java.lang.String defaultFile,
                   java.lang.Boolean listDirectory)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor - creates the HttpRequest object
        Parameters:
        socket - expects to recieve an TCPsocket port to run on
        contentDirectory - Default directory were HTML content will be served from. (type String)
        defaultFile - Default file that will be looked for and served. (type String)
        listDirectory - Boolean value of whether to list directory contents.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if an error is encountered

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Impplement the run() method of the Runnable interface

        Fires up the processRequest method.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • walk

        public java.lang.String walk(java.lang.String path)
        Walk the directory provided in the URL path

        If listDirectory is set to true in the settings.cfg this should return the directory contents as an unordered list to be shown to the end user.

        Parameters:
        path - URL path to currently requested directory as String
        Returns:
        HTML unordered list of files and directories

      • contentType

        public static java.lang.String contentType(java.lang.String fileName)
        Returns the content MIME header based on file name Parses the file location string and tries to determine the file type based on the file externsion.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file location string with file extension.
        Returns:
        Header MIME type
